Post-Production

5 tactics I use to streamline my post-production workflow. They are Stay organized, Choose the right software, Create documentation, Tackle one job at a time, & finally Get accurate feedback.

Mixing/Mastering

I provide a complete Mixing/Mastering process, working closely with artists to identify the intended outcome (sound) and produce masters which stand out from other, less professional, results.

Live Recording

Seasoned Live recording engineer adjusting speakers, microphones and other sound equipment.

Sound Design

Whether it's a brand signature, animation, ad or video game, I will create a full soundscape to add it another dimension. My goal? To bring energy, personality and depth to any video or visual content.
